ResearchProjectDef.label: synstruct infrastructure
ResearchProjectDef.description: Discover the basic infrastructure needed to produce and maintain synstructs.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: You have started down the path of producing synstructs. Additional letters will appear at appropriate moments, but it should be known that they are created at the synstruct cradle and repaired, upgraded, and operated on using repair stims rather than medicine. They also have differing needs entirely, and may require a very different kind of colony than normal to be fully self-sufficient. They do not rest, but must take time to maintain themselves to sustain a coherent existence. While they can consume food for energy (usually at low efficiency), they are better serviced by charging at a specialized charging station or via a normal bed with an attached bedside charger.

ResearchProjectDef.label: interchangeable parts
ResearchProjectDef.description: Establish a standard for repairing and restoring synstructs. Create tools to upgrade their parts.

ResearchProjectDef.label: synstruct stimulators
ResearchProjectDef.description: Formulate chemical solutions to provide short-term enhancements for synstructs.
